author: Jirt

text:
I'm about to enter the final dungeon in Tales of Vesperia. I did some sidequests before and there's the Namco Bandai Island that opens up with minigames and stuff like that. There's a spot where you can play music from other Namco/Bandai games and I couldn't help but smile when this track started playing while I was running around.

This game aged well and is still very fun, it's too bad they basically abandoned this franchise.
author: SupraDarky
